skill_e.tooltip:
Ezreal teleports to a nearby location and fires a bolt at the nearest enemy, dealing ? magic damage.

Arcane Shift will prioritize targets stuck with Essence Flux.

skill_i.tooltip: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

skill_q.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing ? physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by ? seconds if Mystic Shot hits a target.

skill_r.tooltip:
Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a long range missile that deals ? magic damage to each enemy it passes through.

Deals ?% damage to minions and non-epic monsters.

skill_w.tooltip:
Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit for ? seconds.

Hitting the orb with an ability or attack detonates it dealing ? magic damage. Detonating with an ability refunds the cost of that ability +? mana.
